app.name: CleanRip
app.long_description: A tool to backup your Gamecube/Wii Discs via IOS58 Features: - FAT/NTFS - USB 2.0 support - Front SD support - BCA Dumping - Redump.org Rip Verification Requirements: - Wii - Wii/GC Controller - USB or SD storage device (>1.35GB free space) - HBC 1.0.8 or greater installed
